snippet.title: Johnny Depp attends charity event in Lisbon during divorce drama
snippet.description:
(27 May 2016) 
AP Entertainment
Lisbon, 27 May 2016
1. Close of Johnny Depp and Joe Perry entering the room, pull out to wide 
2. Close of Johnny Depp
3. Various of Johnny Depp interacting with elderly lady patient
4. Close of Alice Cooper and Joe Perry
5. Mid of Johnny Depp, Alice Cooper placing hearing device in lady's ear 
6. SOUNDBITE (English) Joe Perry, Recording Artist:
"I've lost a bit of hearing over the years you know because of what I do and I've been through this and I know what it's like to have the sound come back, you know, and it's like - it's incredible what Dr. Starkey does and to take part it's a privilege. It really is. It's a feeling that you don't get either way.
7. Close of Johnny Depp interacting with patient
8. Close of Alice Cooper
9. Mid of Bruce Witkin (left), Robert DeLeo (center) and Tommy Henriksen (right), members of Hollywood Vampires
10. Mid of Johnny Depp and Hollywood Vampires interacting with lady patient
11. Close of Johnny Depp
12. SOUNDBITE (English) Alice Cooper, Recording Artist - on their concert:
"Well, tonight we're doing, we pay tribute to all of the guys that were our big brothers, Jimi Hendrix, Jim Morrison, John Lennon, you know, Keith Moon, all of the guys that were our big brothers that passed away, so we're doing all of their songs tonight. It's sort of our tribute, our tip of the hat to the guys that taught us. And everybody up there is in bands now, big bands, but all our bands learned from their bands."
13. Various of Alice Cooper placing hearing device in patient's ear
14. SOUNDBITE (English) Alice Cooper, Recording Artist: 
"In Los Angeles all of the guys used to meet at one place, one bar every night, the Rainbow Bar - and we drank all night. That was our drinking club. Jim Morrison passed away, Jimi Hendrix passed away, John Lennon, Keith Moon, Harry Nilsson, T. Rex, I mean all of these guys were Hollywood vampires and they called us that because nobody ever saw us during the day (Iaughs). They only saw us at night and all we ever did was drink so they kind of deemed us the Hollywood vampires and then I talked to Johnny Depp then, I did a movie with Johnny and I told him about this and Johnny is a great guitar player and he said, "Well, why don't we put a band together and honor all of our dead, drunk friends?' So we did and it worked and we connected up with, you know, with Bill Austin and it just seems to be a great partnership. We'll be doing many, many more of these."
15. Alice Cooper interacting with patient ++UPSOUND++ "Now unfortunately you will have to hear my music++
16. Close of Alice Cooper with UPSOUND, "Dr. Cooper is still here"
17. Close of Johnny Depp with UPSOUND, "He's the Dr., I'm not (laughs.)"
18. Mid of Johnny Depp talking with teenage patient while he is attended by Dr. Bill Austin
19. Close of Dr. Bill Austin and Joe Perry 
20. Johnny Depp joking with teenage patient
21. SOUNDBITE (English) Johnny Depp, Actor: 
"You know if you can make somebody smile in some way and help somebody that's everything, you know? Thank you very much."
22. Johnny Depp hugging teenage patient
STORYLINE:
While Johnny Depp's estranged wife Amber Heard was filing a restraining order against him, he and his Hollywood Vampires bandmates were in Lisbon Friday (27 MAY 2016) attending a Starkey Hearing Foundation event ahead of a performance.
"You know if you can make somebody smile in some way and help somebody that's everything, you know?" said Depp.
Depp, Alice Cooper and Joe Perry helped fit hearing impaired patients with free hearing devices at the event, where they laughed and joked with patients.

Find out more about AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/HowWeWork 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AP_Archive 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/APArchives ​​
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/APNews/


You can license this story through AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/metadata/youtube/dc0b48282686151d011a101e5c3e3ed5
